description: This file defines the NeonFunTheme class which provides theming configurations for a Flutter application, including a light theme style, a header gradient, and neon glow effects.

classes.name: NeonFunTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods for theming and styling in a Flutter app based on a neon fun theme style.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with colors, text styles, app bar, card, button, chip theme, and other UI elements matching the neon fun style guide.

methods.name: playfulHeaderGradient
methods.description: Generates a LinearGradient for header backgrounds using theme colors, with a neon-like transparency effect.

methods.name: neonGlow
methods.description: Creates a soft neon glow BoxShadow list for UI elements, based on the provided color and optional blur radius.
